1.name: The Day After Tomorrow
1.description: Jack Hall, paleoclimatologist, must make a daring trek from Washington, D.C. to New York City, to reach his son, trapped in the cross-hairs of a sudden international storm which plunges the planet into a new Ice Age.

2.name: The Punisher
2.description: An undercover FBI agent becomes a vigilante assassin and sets out to unleash his wrath upon the corrupt businessman who slaughtered his entire family at a reunion.

3.name: Troy
3.description: An adaptation of Homer's great epic, the film follows the assault on Troy by the united Greek forces and chronicles the fates of the men involved.

4.name: The Incredibles
4.description: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.

5.name: The Machinist
5.description: An industrial worker who hasn't slept in a year begins to doubt his own sanity.

6.name: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
6.description: It's Harry's third year at Hogwarts; not only does he have a new "Defense Against the Dark Arts" teacher, but there is also trouble brewing. Convicted murderer Sirius Black has escaped the Wizards' Prison and is coming after Harry.

7.name: The Butterfly Effect
7.description: Evan Treborn suffers blackouts during significant events of his life. As he grows up, he finds a way to remember these lost memories and a supernatural way to alter his life by reading his journal.

8.name: Mean Girls
8.description: Cady Heron is a hit with The Plastics, the A-list girl clique at her new school, until she makes the mistake of falling for Aaron Samuels, the ex-boyfriend of alpha Plastic Regina George.

9.name: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
9.description: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.

10.name: The Village
10.description: A series of events tests the beliefs of a small isolated countryside village.

11.name: The Notebook
11.description: A poor yet passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman, giving her a sense of freedom, but they are soon separated because of their social differences.

12.name: Crash
12.description: Los Angeles citizens with vastly separate lives collide in interweaving stories of race, loss and redemption.

13.name: The Girl Next Door
13.description: A teenager's dreams come true when a former porn star moves in next door and they fall in love.

14.name: Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed
14.description: The Mystery Inc. gang must save Coolsville from an attack of past unmasked monsters brought to life by an evil masked figure trying to "unmask" the gang.

15.name: Closer
15.description: The relationships of two couples become complicated and deceitful when the man from one couple meets the woman of the other.

16.name: Shaun of the Dead
16.description: A man's uneventful life is disrupted by the zombie apocalypse.

17.name: A Series of Unfortunate Events
17.description: When a massive fire kills their parents, three children are delivered to the custody of cousin and stage actor Count Olaf, who is secretly plotting to steal their parents' vast fortune.

18.name: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
18.description: A group of misfits enter a Las Vegas dodgeball tournament in order to save their cherished local gym from the onslaught of a corporate health fitness chain.

19.name: The Phantom of the Opera
19.description: A young soprano becomes the obsession of a disfigured musical genius who lives beneath the Paris Opéra House. He kidnaps the soprano and forces the owners of the play to keep her as the lead role of the play.

20.name: Dawn of the Dead
20.description: A nurse, a policeman, a young married couple, a salesman, and other survivors of a worldwide plague that is producing aggressive, flesh-eating zombies, take refuge in a mega Midwestern shopping mall.

21.name: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
21.description: The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd, and the treacherous, one-eyed Elle.

22.name: Hellboy
22.description: A demon, raised from infancy after being conjured by and rescued from the Nazis, grows up to become a defender against the forces of darkness.

23.name: National Treasure
23.description: A historian races to find the legendary Templar Treasure before a team of mercenaries.

24.name: White Chicks
24.description: Two disgraced FBI agents go way undercover in an effort to protect hotel heiresses the Wilson Sisters from a kidnapping plot.

25.name: Million Dollar Baby
25.description: A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.

26.name: Cellular
26.description: A young man receives an emergency phone call on his cell phone from an older woman. The catch? The woman claims to have been kidnapped; and the kidnappers have targeted her husband and child next.

27.name: The Aviator
27.description: A biopic depicting the early years of legendary Director and aviator Howard Hughes' career from the late 1920s to the mid 1940s.

28.name: Collateral
28.description: A cab driver finds himself the hostage of an engaging contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in Los Angeles.

29.name: Walking Tall
29.description: A former U.S. soldier returns to his hometown to find it overrun by crime and corruption, which prompts him to clean house.

30.name: Saw
30.description: Two strangers, who awaken in a room with no recollection of how they got there, soon discover they're pawns in a deadly game perpetrated by a notorious serial killer.

31.name: Der Untergang
31.description: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.

32.name: Van Helsing
32.description: The notorious monster hunter is sent to Transylvania to stop Count Dracula who is using Dr. Frankenstein's research and a werewolf for some sinister purpose.

33.name: The Princess Diaries 2: Royal Engagement
33.description: Now settled in Genovia, Princess Mia faces a new revelation: she is being primed for an arranged marriage to an English suitor.

34.name: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
34.description: Alice wakes up in Racoon city hospital after the city has been overrun by zombies. Alice must now make it out of the city before a mucilage bomb is dropped on the city.

35.name: The Chronicles of Riddick
35.description: The wanted criminal Riddick arrives on a planet called Helion Prime, and finds himself up against an invading empire called the Necromongers, an army that plans to convert or kill all humans in the universe.

36.name: King Arthur
36.description: A demystified take on the tale of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table.

37.name: 50 First Dates
37.description: Henry Roth is a man afraid of commitment up until he meets the beautiful Lucy. They hit it off and Henry think he's finally found the girl of his dreams, until he discovers she has short-term memory loss and forgets him the next day.

38.name: Napoleon Dynamite
38.description: A listless and alienated teenager decides to help his new friend win the class presidency in their small western high school, while he must deal with his bizarre family life back home.

39.name: Spider-Man 2
39.description: Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a brilliant scientist named Doctor Otto Octavius.

40.name: Shrek 2
40.description: Princess Fiona's parents invite her and Shrek to dinner to celebrate her marriage. If only they knew the newlyweds were both ogres.

41.name: Man on Fire
41.description: In Mexico City, a former assassin swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

42.name: 13 Going on 30
42.description: A girl makes a wish on her thirteenth birthday, and wakes up the next day as a thirty-year-old woman.

43.name: Dead Man's Shoes
43.description: A disaffected soldier returns to his hometown to get even with the thugs who brutalized his mentally-challenged brother years ago.

44.name: Hauru no ugoku shiro
44.description: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

45.name: The Passion of the Christ
45.description: Depicts the final twelve hours in the life of Jesus of Nazareth, on the day of his crucifixion in Jerusalem.

46.name: The Terminal
46.description: An Eastern European tourist unexpectedly finds himself stranded in JFK airport, and must take up temporary residence there.

47.name: Alexander
47.description: Alexander, the King of Macedonia and one of the greatest army leaders in the history of warfare, conquers much of the known world.

48.name: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
48.description: Ron Burgundy is San Diego's top-rated newsman in the male-dominated broadcasting of the 1970s, but that's all about to change for Ron and his cronies when an ambitious woman is hired as a new anchor.

49.name: Layer Cake
49.description: A successful cocaine dealer gets two tough assignments from his boss on the eve of his planned early retirement.

50.name: A Cinderella Story
50.description: Routinely exploited by her wicked stepmother, the downtrodden Sam Montgomery is excited about the prospect of meeting her Internet beau at the school's Halloween dance.
